navigation.deleteMessage: Deleting navigation items also removes them from the navigation tree.

navigationItem.isVisibleHelpText: Make this navigation item available to the storefront for both customers and admins.
navigationItem.isPrivateHelpText: Show only to admins. Used for staging changes to the navigation without exposing it to customers. "Show in storefront" must be checked.
navigationItem.isSecondaryHelpText: Prevent this item from showing up as a main navigation item. This item may still be visible in some navigation bars or sidebars.
